en: Interactive sessions focusing on sensory development and social skills for infants and toddlers (ages 0-2).
zh-HK: 互動課程，專注於嬰幼兒（0-2歲）的感官發展和社交技能。

en: Teaches foundational sound recognition and blending skills necessary for reading success, covering all levels from basic to advanced.
zh-HK: 教授基本的發音識別和拼讀技巧，是閱讀成功的基礎，涵蓋從基礎到高級的所有級別。

en: Comprehensive program covering grammar, composition, reading comprehension, and critical thinking for primary students.
zh-HK: 涵蓋語法、寫作、閱讀理解和批判性思維的小學綜合課程。

en: Our specialized math program designed to build strong numerical foundations and problem-solving skills for primary school students.
zh-HK: 我們的專業數學課程，旨在為小學生建立強大的數字基礎和解決問題的能力。

en: A unique auditory learning system designed to enhance listening skills and vocabulary acquisition through storytelling and music.
zh-HK: 獨特的聽覺學習系統，通過講故事和音樂來提高聽力技能和詞彙量。

en: Focuses on early literacy through interactive games and songs, suitable for ages 2-4, helping children recognize common characters.
zh-HK: 專注於透過互動遊戲和歌曲進行早期識字，適合2-4歲，幫助孩子識別常用字符。

en: Intensive course on Hanyu Pinyin (Romanization system) for Mandarin Chinese, essential for pronunciation and input methods.
zh-HK: 漢語拼音（普通話羅馬化系統）的強化課程，對發音和輸入法至關重要。

en: Advanced Chinese curriculum covering classical texts, advanced composition, and cultural studies for older students.
zh-HK: 針對高年級學生的進階中文課程，涵蓋古典文本、進階寫作和文化研究。

en: * Cancellation Notice: If your child cannot attend a lesson, please notify us at least four hours before the lesson starts. If we are not informed, the lesson will be charged. * Arrangement: We shall arrange make-up classes within the week of the cancelled lesson(s) – by request or by enforcement. * Written Notice: Cancellations must be informed in advance and in writing (preferably by email/WhatsApp) so that we can make the necessary arrangements. * Sick Leave: If students are taking sick leave, please provide a doctor's certificate to arrange make-up classes. * Warning: Classes missed without proper notice will not be made-up later and will be charged. * Validity: Make-up classes must be taken within the duration of the course and cannot be carried over to the next term. * Guarantee: We regret we cannot guarantee a replacement class with the original instructor or requested time. * Free Quota: Every student is entitled to 2 free make-up lessons for each 8 paid sessions OR 3 free make-up lessons for each 10 paid sessions. * Administrative Fee: If you exceed the free make-up class quota, you will need to pay an administrative fee of HK$100 for each supplementary class. * Short Absence (≤ 2 weeks): If your child cannot attend lessons for a period of two weeks or less, and you wish to retain their time-slot, please inform us in advance and in writing. We will make special arrangements whenever possible. * Long Absence (≥ 3 weeks): If your child cannot attend lessons for a period of three weeks or more, your child’s time-slot may be released. (Please contact us for further arrangements.) * Course Validity: All paid courses must be completed within 3 months (counting from the first lesson). * Refund/Transfer Policy: We regret that we cannot, under any circumstances, give refunds or credits for lessons already paid for. * Continuation Notice: We assume your child will continue attending classes unless we are notified in writing. If students are not continuing, we require two weeks’ notice prior to the last lesson. * Transfer Inquiry: For class transfer/promotion inquiries, please contact our staff.
zh-HK: * 取消通知： 如果您的孩子無法上課，請在課程開始前至少四小時通知我們。如果我們未收到通知，課程將收取費用。 * 補課安排： 我們將在家長請假後的一周內安排補課。 * 書面通知： 請假必須提前以書面形式（透過電子郵件／WhatsApp）通知我們，以便我們做出必要的安排。 * 病假： 如學生是請病假，請家長提供醫生證明以安排補課。 * 警告： *未經適當通知而缺課的課程將不予補課，並將收取費用。＊ * 有效期： 補課必須在課程期間內完成，不得延續到下學期。 * 保證： 我們無法保證課程與原定授課老師/時間一致。 * 免費額數： 每位學生每8堂付費課程可享2堂免費補課；或每10堂付費課程可享3堂免費補課。 * 行政費： 如超出免費補課額數，每堂補課需付行政費＄１００元正。 * 短期缺席（兩週或以下）： 如果您的孩子無法上課兩週或以下，並且您希望保留孩子平時的上課時間，請提前以書面形式（透過電子郵件/ WhatsApp）通知我們，我們將盡可能為您的孩子做出特殊安排。 * 長期缺席（三週或更長）： 如果您的孩子無法上課三週或更長時間，您孩子的上課時間可能會被取消。（請聯絡我們以了解進一步安排。） * 課程有效期： 所有課程必須在3個月內完成（從課程的第一堂課開始計算）。 * 退費與轉班政策： 十分抱歉，我們在任何情況下均無法為已支付的課程提供退款或轉讓學費。 * 繼續上課通知： 除非我們收到書面通知，否則我們假定您的孩子將繼續上課。如果學生不繼續上課，我們要求在最後一堂課前兩週通知。 * 轉班查詢： 如想了解轉班／升班，請跟我們的職員聯絡。
